org.pepstock.charba.client

Class GlobalOptions.GlobalPlugins

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.commons.NativeObjectContainer
      • org.pepstock.charba.client.commons.AbstractNode
        • org.pepstock.charba.client.options.AbstractModel<Options,IsDefaultPlugins>
          • org.pepstock.charba.client.options.Plugins
            • org.pepstock.charba.client.GlobalOptions.GlobalPlugins
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IsDefaultPlugins
    Enclosing class:
    GlobalOptions

    private static final class GlobalOptions.GlobalPlugins
extends Plugins
    Extends the options element to configure plugins in order to request to the plugin by its options to merge the original defaults, otherwise the defaults of plugin will be lost.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private ChartEnvelop<String> envelop 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      private GlobalPlugins(ChartEnvelop<Plugins> envelop)
      Creates the object getting the original instance of Plugins} in the Options, in order to override the setOptions method to force the merge.

      • setOptions

        public <T extends AbstractPluginOptions> void setOptions(String pluginId,
                                                         T options)
        Description copied from class: Plugins
        Sets the plugin options.
        If passed options is null, the configuration of plugin will be removed.
        Overrides:
        setOptions in class Plugins
        Type Parameters:
        T - type of plugin options to store
        Parameters:
        pluginId - plugin id.
        options - plugin options used to configure the plugin.
        Pass null to remove the configuration if exist.
